definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.english: You spend one-second of the monthly expense on body-building .
sentences.chinese: 你将月开销的二分之一用于健身运动。

sentences.english: Secondhand smoke causes at least half the cases of lung cancer in non-smokers.
sentences.chinese: 二手烟会导致至少二分之一的不吸烟者致癌。

sentences.english: Moreover, of the amount spent on the sports venues, the government shoulders only about one-half.
sentences.chinese: 而且，政府只承担了二分之一的体育场馆建设费用。

sentences.english: The Chinese industry produces about half of these made in the world.
sentences.chinese: 中国生产的外置电源占全世界总产量的二分之一左右。

sentences.english: Among the Ci of Ou Yangxiu, works about love reached over one half.
sentences.chinese: 欧的词中，写爱情的作品占全部词作的二分之一以上。

sentences.english: Tne population of this country is about half of that one.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家在人口数量上相当于那个国家的二分之一。

sentences.english: How much is one over two times the square usu'sly root of pi?
sentences.chinese: 圆周率的平方根的二分之一是多少？

sentences.english: Half of the disposables are consumed within China.
sentences.chinese: 在中国消费的一次性筷子约占二分之一。

sentences.english: What does a 1/2-cup serving of cereal really look like?
sentences.chinese: 二分之一杯的麦片到底有多少？

sentences.english: Toast one-half of a whole-wheat English muffin.
sentences.chinese: 烤二分之一的英式全麦松饼。

sentences.english: Fifty, 55% of you or so are likely to end up with some kind of a B.
sentences.chinese: 二分之一左右的人以80分结课。

sentences.english: A twelfth part of the labour of making a plough is an appreciable quantity.
sentences.chinese: 时间量是全音符的三十二分之一的一个音乐符号。
